findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The _upgradeToAndCall function can be used to upgrade the implementation of the contract without proper access control, allowing an attacker to potentially upgrade the script and gain unauthorized control.

findings.title: Unprotected approval in approve function
findings.description: The approve function does not have any protection against unauthorized approvals.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer in transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function does not have sufficient protection against unauthorized transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom in transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function does not have sufficient access control, allowing unauthorized transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected burn in burn function
findings.description: The burn function does not have any protection mechanism, allowing unauthorized users to burn tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected burnFrom in burnFrom function
findings.description: The burnFrom function does not have sufficient protection, allowing unauthorized access and potential exploitation.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance in increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function does not have proper protection against unauthorized allowance increases.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance in decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function does not properly restrict access to decreasing allowance, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.
